title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the real estate market analysis and price prediction tool, including data sources, analysis techniques, and desired outputs.

title: Design System Architecture for AnalisisInmobiliarioIa
description: This RFC proposes a high-level system architecture design for 'AnalisisInmobiliarioIa'. The focus is on a modular and scalable solution that addresses key aspects such as data ingestion, storage (SQL/NoSQL), processing (batch/stream), machine learning model training and deployment, serving predictions, fault tolerance, monitoring, security, and edge cases. This document outlines the following areas for specific attention: data sources, data pipelines, real-time data streaming mechanisms, machine learning model selection and training strategies, API design for prediction serving, deployment infrastructure, CI/CD pipeline setup, database schema design, security measures, incident response plans, system documentation. It also emphasizes on error handling, performance optimizations, maintainability best practices, and readability improvements by breaking down sections into smaller paragraphs. The RFC will be refined based on input from 'database-specialist', 'devops-engineer', 'security-specialist'. Subtasks will be created for each specialist to ensure collaboration. Once all collaborators have provided their input, the 'task-decomposer' will integrate their suggestions and update the overall system design. This updated RFC is now ready for the 'task-decomposer' to proceed with task decomposition. The 'project-manager' and 'code-architect' are encouraged to review this document to ensure alignment with project goals and technical feasibility. To improve readability, consider breaking down sections into smaller paragraphs.

title: Set up Data Pipeline
description: Implement a data pipeline to collect and preprocess real estate market data from various sources.

title: Develop Data Storage and Processing
description: Design and implement a scalable data storage solution and data processing components for cleaning, transforming, and preparing data for analysis.

title: Implement Machine Learning Models
description: Develop and train machine learning models for real estate market analysis and price prediction.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop a user-friendly interface for interacting with the real estate market analysis and price prediction tool.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Ensure data privacy and security by implementing appropriate access controls and security measures.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the application meets the requirements and functions as expected.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Prepare comprehensive documentation, including installation guides, user manuals, and API references.
